title: Rogue
description: When people get too close to me, they wind up dead. Blood. Bullet holes. Stab wounds. I’ve kept my identity secret to protect the ones I love, but now the most dangerous man in my world knows exactly who I am… And he’s coming for me.  Hector Ramirez has brought war to my doorstep, but he won’t win.  I’ll fight to defend the vulnerable.  I’ll kill to protect my club.  But I’ll die to save the woman I love.
author: Callie Hart
